title: No matter what I have tried, no OK Google sound is still not being made on my phone
content: Still no notification sound from Google assistant. I have tried so many things at this point I'm ready to give up. Google assistant still works fine, it just does not make the sound when I say "OK Google or Hey Google." Oddly enough, the sound works when I am connected via Bluetooth or Android Auto in my vehicle. I just hate the fact that I need to look at my phone when using Google Assistant to know they are listening.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
